ygData.subject: Re: rumors
ygData.msgSnippet: I tried the thermal cloak, no go. Said these items don t combine. (Small cloak was what I used) But I could have just been wrong. Because I used a Belt as
ygData.messageBody:
I tried the thermal cloak, no go. Said these items don't combine. (Small
cloak was
what I used) But I could have just been wrong. Because I used a Belt as
well.
And a cloth rope, because I'm a mage and can't were a belt. So, I've got no
clue.

-Zikkin

P.S. the Eldritch Collective is the keepers of Tinkering info I think.
But what that means? Good question. I think that you have to complete
quests for the Collective, the Spare Lens quest would be one to try,
but at level 19 I can't even get the quest. Anyone of a lower level want
to try this one? No one has finished it as far as I know.



corenee wrote:

> From: corenee <corenee@...>
>
> first i would like to say ya'll are doin a great thing here. Here's what
> i have heard, there are three other books(besides the two at mills)
> where or when you get em is beyond me. I too have made the firewater,
> and the lantern, and say one person auctioning off the cams for the
> bows, so i know those have been made also. As has already been posted i
> too heard that the infravision goggles instructions came from a quest.
> Which one i don't know. Also i know as a fact that you can tinker
> successfully at level 1, but cannot gain any skill level til level 16.
> So all of you that are waiting to try it, go for it...it will work, i
> decided to try it at level 11 with my gnome, and made fire water on
> first try. Also i believe that you can make the thermal cloak from just
> about any cloak...doesn't have to be tattered... I am wanting to try
> similar things with lanterns ans stuff..(i.e. use small lantern and
> such). If anyone has tried it with other items please let me know.
>
> Jaqui(math marr)
>
